article_title: Five Tax Trends to Watch in 2014

article_metadata.description: With congressional elections coming in November, ongoing controversy over the Affordable Care Act, and policy exhaustion on the part of both Congress and the White House, don’t expect dramatic changes in tax policy in 2014. But there will still be some important issues on the table—not all of them in [...]
